item.title: Code.org
item.description: Review Summary Code.org has helped the cause and explained really well that learning to code coding is important Very well designed coding / gaming flow Hour of Code and Code Studio are the key aspects of the site. It has the visual programming environment that enables dragging coding blocks to solve a puzzle. Kindergartners might struggle a bit with use of mouse to navigate.

item.title: Resources
item.description: IXL https://www.ixl.com/science/ Great Standard Core spead of topics. Covers every skills in the curriculum for K-8 Science concepts taught through interactive steps Questions are generated to make sure students get the concepts Helps with educational gaps and when you want some more accountability in the teaching at home There are always areas that your child can practice extra.
